business.headline: Gone bananas! Most Kerala tea-time snacks come under 18% GST From 'pazhampori' to 'ada' and 'undam pori,' beloved Malayali tea-time snacks find themselves caught in the bewildering GST maze. These humble delicacies come with an 18 per cent GST tag, all because they do not have the required 'classification' to be put elsewhere.

Harley-Davidson bikes to get cheaper as Centre cuts tariff amid Trump threatDonald Trump has consistently pushed for reducing trade barriers, especially on products that the US manufactures, and the high tariff on Harley-Davidson has been a point of contention in the past.
Increased TDS limit, exemption for NSS: Big relief for senior citizens Budget 2025 announced major tax reforms for senior citizens, reducing their tax burden and giving a boost to their savings.

Will boost savings, investment, consumption, growth: PM on BudgetPrime Minister Narendra Modi praised the Union Budget 2025, calling it a "force multiplier" that will boost savings, investment, consumption, and growth.
TDS reforms announced, limit for senior citizens doubledBudget 2025: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced an increase in the TDS threshold in the Union Budget 2025.

Everyone's praising you, Budget is very good: PM praises Nirmala SitharamanThe Prime Minister walked up to the bench where Nirmala Sitharaman was seated and expressed his gratitude for presenting her eighth and the Modi 3.0 government's first Budget today.

No tax payable up to Rs 12 lakh income: Budget bonanza for middle classFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced that taxpayers with salaries up to Rs 12 lakh would not be required to pay tax in the new tax regime. Sitharaman also proposed changes in the slab structure of the new income tax regime.
New Income Tax Bill next week, will focus on easing taxpayer convenience: Finance MinisterFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman to unveil new Income Tax Bill next week.
Boost for MSMEs, classification investment cap to be hiked 2.5 times The Indian government would strengthen the country's MSME sector.

Middle class hero with massive tax relief, Bihar big beneficiaryFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced big reforms focused on income tax relief for the middle class in addition to major reforms in agriculture, with Bihar in focus.

Budget for common man, says PM Modi at Cabinet meet: SourcesBudget 2025-2026 is likely to provide a much-needed boost to the middle class amid high inflation with the nation's GDP growth projected to slow down to a four-year low of 6.4 per cent.

Will stock market investors get tax relief from this budget?Capital gains tax and stock market investors: Experts anticipate that Budget 2025 should not announce new taxes, instead, provide tax rebates to boost the consumption levels and revive market sentiment.

Sensex gains over 300 points, Nifty goes past 23,600   Live UpdatesStock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex was up by 278.80 points to 77,779.37, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 81.80 points to 23,590.20 as of 11:29 AM.

Use this income tax calculator to check your tax outgo under both regimesCalculate income tax online: Experts suggest that 'Modi 3.0' may introduce measures to make the new income tax regime more appealing to taxpayers.

Commercial LPG cylinder rates slashed by Rs 7 ahead of Union BudgetThe rate of 19 kg commercial LPG cylinders has been reduced by Rs 7 ahead of the Union Budget 2025-26. A commercial LPG cylinder will now be available in Delhi for Rs 1,797.

Budget 2025: Is stock market open for trading today?Stock market today: The Budget is one of the most important events for the stock market, with policy changes and fiscal measures often leading to sharp movements in stock prices.
India must grow at 8% for at least 10 years for 'Viksit Bharat': Economic SurveyThe Indian economy is expected to grow between 6.3% to 6.8% in FY26, according to the Economic Survey.

Why middle class can expect tax relief todayUnion Budget 2025 Expectations: The government is likely to roll out schemes that focus on offering economic and tax relief to the middle class, poor and women.

Sensex, Nifty rally as markets ride consumer goods wave ahead of BudgetSensex Nifty rise ahead of Budget 2025: The S&P BSE Sensex surged 740.76 points to end at 77,500.57, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 258.90 points to close at 23,508.40.

What Economic Survey has to say on office hours amid work-life balance debateThe pre-Budget Economic Survey's findings come amid an ongoing debate over extended workweeks, sparked by recent remarks from business leaders advocating 70-to 90-hour workweeks.

entertainment.headline: Singer Millind Gaba, wife Pria Beniwal announce pregnancy: Our hearts are fullSinger Millind Gaba and his wife Pria Beniwal are expecting their first child. They got married in 2022.

Netflix's The Sandman cancelled, to end with Season 2The production of The Sandman has been cancelled following sexual harassment allegations against creator Neil Gaiman. Despite this, Netflix will still release season two in 2025.

Shark Tank's Kunal Bahl reflects on pricing differences between iPhone, AndroidIn an exclusive chat, Kunal Bahl addressed the ongoing debate about app pricing differences on Android and iOS. He also shared insights on the impact of online shopping in India.

Tillotama Shome on 'misrepresentation, under-representation' of Northeast IndiaActor Tillotama Shome spoke to India Today in an exclusive interview about playing Meghna Barua in Paatal Lok 2. The actor talked about how Indian cinema 'misrepresents' and 'under-represents' Northeast India.

Cult of Fear – Asaram Bapu review: A fair look at rise and fall of notorious GodmanReleased-Wed Jan 29, 2025In Cult of Fear-Asaram Bapu, you see the testimonies of Bapu's followers, the victims of his cult, journalists and researchers trying to explain how he did what he did.

Singer Udit Narayan on controversy over kissing female fans: Hum decent log haiVideos of singer Udit Narayan kissing female fans on the lips during a live performance went viral. Now, the singer has addressed the controversy and called it fans' 'deewangi', and said it shouldn't be given so much attention.

Stunning pics from Raftaar-Manraj's Sikh and South Indian wedding ceremoniesRapper Raftaar married fashion stylist Manraj Jawanda in a dual wedding ceremony recently. The two shared a few dreamy pictures from their two weddings on social media.

Ibrahim Ali Khan-Khushi Kapoor ready for 'Nadaaniyan' in his debut Netflix filmIbrahim Ali Khan announced his debut film, titled Nadaaniyan, with Khushi Kapoor on Saturday. It's a Netflix film directed by Shauna Gautam.

Chris Martin's new video from Maha Kumbh goes viral as he takes holy dip at SangamColdplay's Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson were seen taking a holy dip at the Sangam in Maha Kumbh 2025 in a new video shared by a fan on Instagram. At one point, Chris also folded his hands and greeted the fellow devotees at the Sangam.

Paatal Lok 2 to Yeh Kaali Kaali Ankhein 2: The art of making successful sequelOTT platforms are capitalising on the growing demand for sequels as audiences crave familiar characters and stories amid rapid global changes. Netflix India's Tanya Bami and Prime Video India's Nikhil Madhok decode how they green-light a sequel in this week's Cinematic Saturday.

Pic: Emily in Paris actor Lily Collins, husband Charlie McDowell welcome baby girlActor Lily Collins and director Charlie McDowell have become parents to a baby girl via surrogate. They shared the happy news on social media, along with a picture of the baby.

Disgusting: Singer Udit Narayan faces backlash for kissing female fans on lipsUdit Narayan faces criticism for kissing fans: Veteran singer Udit Narayan's videos kissing female fans on their lips during a live performance went viral. The incident has sparked intense reactions online.

Felt like a personal loss: Ishwak Singh on Imran Ansari's death in Paatal Lok 2Actor Ishwak Singh, who plays the role of IPS Ansari in Paatal Lok 2, spoke about the sudden twist in the series when his character is gunned down in Nagaland.

Black Warrant makers on honest portrayal of Ranga-Billa case, and the peacock sceneBlack Warrant creators, Vikramaditya Motwane and Satyanshu Singh, decode how they stayed true to the book, and the portrayal of the Ranga-Billa case in their series.

Marco OTT release: When and where to watch Unni Mukundan's gory thrillerMarco OTT Release Date: After having a phenomenal run at the box office, the Malayalam gore film Marco is set to release on OTT. Starring Unni Mukundan in the lead role, the film will release on Sony LIV in February.

For the love of Korean variety shows In this week's installment of Weekly K-Fix, we discuss a specific genre of Korean entertainment -- their variety shows. From superstars such as BTS and Seventeen, to the beloved MC Yoo Jae-Suk, everyone has appeared in them. Here's a quick look at why they are so popular in South Korea.

Amit Trivedi on using AI in music production: There are flip sides to everythingAmit Trivedi on AI in music: Renowned composer Amit Trivedi shared insights on AI's role in music at a recent event. He emphasised balancing technology with human creativity.

You Season 5 teaser: Joe Goldberg prepares for a grand goodbyeThe first teaser of Penn Badgley-starrer You Season 5 is here. The video shows Penn's character, Joe Goldberg, bidding a final farewell to the audience.

Jaideep Ahlawat discusses the 'homosexuality' scene from Paatal Lok 2Actors Jaideep Ahlawat and Tillotama Shome discuss what makes their characters in the show Paatal Lok 2 so extraordinary and rich. In an exclusive interview with India Today digital, the two underscore the importance of playing Hathi Ram Chaudhary, and Meghna Barua, in a series which is based in Nagaland.

Stranger Things S5: Millie Bobby goes missing in latest poster from showA new poster of Stranger Things Season 5 is out. The picture features lead star Millie Bobby Brown in it. A release date of the show is yet to be announced.

general news.headline: Slums in Delhi won't be razed: PM Modi rebuts Arvind Kejriwal ahead of pollsPrime Minister Narendra Modi, addressing an election rally in Delhi's RK Puram, praised the recently announced Union Budget by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, calling it a middle-class friendly budget.

Shashi Tharoor's fresh take on Hindutva with 'British football hooligan' analogyTharoor made the remarks while addressing a session at the ongoing Jaipur Literature Festival alongside Spanish writer Francesc Miralles, co-author of the global bestseller 'Ikigai'.

PM Modi heard taxpayers' voice, supported income tax cut: Nirmala SitharamanFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said PM Modi was clear about the need for tax relief, with the ministry working on the proposal. She highlighted efforts to simplify direct taxes and reduce the compliance burden for taxpayers.

Dominant India crush South Africa to clinch second successive titleICC U19 Women's T20 World Cup: A dominant Indian side hammered South Africa by nine wickets in the final to clinch their second successive title in Kuala Lumpur on Sunday, February 2.

Hide, work, hide: A day in the life of an Indian illegal immigrant in the USWake up, go to work, return. Repeat. From the outside, a day in the life of an illegal Indian immigrant in the US does not look unusual. But they can neither get a registered job nor a driving licence, and have no legal recourse if they become victims of crime. India Today Digital spoke to several people residing in the US and pieced together a day in the life of an illegal Indian immigrant.

Americans will suffer, says Trudeau as Canada responds in kind to Trump tariffsOn Saturday, Trump signed an executive order to place duties of 10 per cent on all imports from China and 25 per cent on imports from Mexico and Canada. But energy imported from Canada, including oil, natural gas and electricity, would be taxed at a 10 per cent rate.

UP man took Rs 40,000 loan to fund sister-in-law's gang-rape, murder; arrested A man in Uttar Pradesh took a loan to hire contract killers to murder his sister-in-law. He has been arrested, but the accomplices remain at large. The victim was gang-raped, strangled, and burned.
Where does the government spend?If the Union Budget was just ₹100, here's how the government would spend it

Caught on CCTV: Haryana Roadways bus crushes toll workers to evade fee A CCTV footage of the incident showed the Haryana Roadways bus driver speeding through the toll gate, hitting employees in an apparent attempt to evade the toll fee.

Trade wars have no winners: China as Trump imposes 10% tariffsChina condemned the US tariff hike, calling it a violation of global trade rules. Beijing vowed countermeasures to protect its interests, warning that the move could disrupt cooperation on drug control. "Trade wars have no winners," the foreign ministry said.

Feel ashamed abroad to admit Delhi lacks essentials: S Jaishankar slams AAPDelhi Election: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar launched a scathing attack on the AAP government ahead of the Delhi Assembly election, saying that the national capital has been lagging behind in terms of basic facilities for the past 10 years under AAP.

A salary hike for middle class as government bets big on it to spend moreAfter tax breaks for corporates failed to boost the economy, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman placed a big bet on the middle class with tax sops in Budget 2025-26. This is how the additional Rs 1 lakh crore in the hands of individual taxpayers will boost consumption, help spur corporate investment and increase the government's indirect tax collection.

Ahmedabad auto driver sings Coldplay song while driving, Internet wants him on stageA video of an auto driver singing along to a Coldplay song while driving through the streets of Ahmedabad went viral.

Pics: Aamir Khan, Ali Fazal face off in world Pickleball League exhibition matchBollywood actors Aamir Khan and Ali Fazal participated in an exciting exhibition match at the World Pickleball League in Mumbai, teaming up with professional players.

With video, White House calls out Selena Gomez for crying over immigration raidsLast week, Hollywood singer-actor Selena Gomez posted, and then deleted, a video on Instagram, where she tearfully expressed concern over the mass deportations that have occurred as part of US President Donald Trump's crackdown on illegal immigration.

Car swerves to avoid stunt biker, flips 5 times, 5 Nepalese pilgrims deadMuzaffarpur Accident: Witnesses have said that the biker was performing stunts on his motorcycle on the four-lane bypass in Madhubani, while the speeding Scorpio SUV was also passing by.
Drunk man climbs 80-foot tower in Bhopal, leaves locals in shock. Viral videoA video of a drunk man who had climbed up an 80-foot mobile tower in Bhopal's Barkhedi area went viral on social media.

Ashneer Grover takes a dig at Salman Khan for creating 'unnecessary drama' on BB 18Ashneer Grover, the former founder of BharatPe, hit back at Salman Khan over their exchange on Bigg Boss 18. During an event on Saturday, Grover said that the superstar created unnecessary drama on the show.

Why did Donald Trump impose tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China?Donald Trump's decision to impose tariffs on China, Canada and Mexico sparked a fierce international dispute, with each nation vowing to take counteraction against 
 the United States.

BJP's new song, AAP's 'Asur' poster: Sunday morning, election engines revvingDelhi Assembly election 2025: With just three days to go for the election, political parties have ramped up their campaigns. On Sunday, AAP unveiled a new poster, while BJP's catchy campaign song added to the political buzz.

Video: PM Modi walks up to Nirmala Sitharaman, praises her after Budget speechPrime Minister Narendra Modi met Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman after her Union Budget speech on Saturday and praised her. In a video, PM Modi can be seen walking up to the Finance Minister's seat in Lok Sabha and greeting her.

Samantha enjoys pickleball match with director Raj Nidimoru Actor Samantha recently opened up about her first sports venture with pickleball. Sharing a series of pictures from her recent matches, she expressed gratitude and reflected on the lessons she has learnt from the experience.

Actor Nani re-unites with Anirudh Ravichander for Srikanth Odela's The ParadiseTelugu actor Nani is all set to re-unite with Anirudh Ravichander for new film, The Paradise, directed by Srikanth Odela.

Pics: Aamir Khan, Ali Fazal face off in world Pickleball League exhibition matchBollywood actors Aamir Khan and Ali Fazal participated in an exciting exhibition match at the World Pickleball League in Mumbai, teaming up with professional players.

sports.headline: Dominant India crush South Africa to clinch second successive titleICC U19 Women's T20 World Cup: A dominant Indian side hammered South Africa by nine wickets in the final to clinch their second successive title in Kuala Lumpur on Sunday, February 2.

Rohit Sharma is my idol, getting BCCI award from him means a lot: Agni ChopraBCCI Award: Agni Chopra, the son of Anupama Chopra and Vidhu Vinod Chopra, received the BCCI award for the "Top Run Getter in the Ranji Trophy Plate League". Agni said that receiving the award from his idol Rohit Sharma meant a lot to him.

Graham Potter on Chelsea sacking: Best thing to have happened to meGraham Potter's return to Stamford Bridge with West Ham promises drama, as the former Chelsea boss looks to prove his managerial growth after a turbulent spell in West London.

Bangladesh appoint independent committee to probe BPL corruption allegationsThe Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) named an independent enquiry committee to assist the Anti-Corruption Unit (ACU) in its ongoing investigation into the Bangladesh Premier League (BPL).

Salah's double in Liverpool's win over Bournemouth, Forest score 7 vs BrightonMohamed Salah's brace powered Liverpool to a crucial win, extending their lead to nine points, while Nottingham Forest ran riot with a stunning 7-0 demolition of Brighton in a goal-packed Premier League night.

U19 Women's T20 World Cup Final Live: India defend title with 9-wicket winIndia (IND) vs South Africa (SA), ICC U19 Women's T20 World Cup Final Live: India complete back to back title wins, and this time with an all-round brilliance in their win over South Africa by nine wickets. Trisha's all-round brilliance shines bright in India's triumph.

Hina Munawar appointed first female manager for Pakistan men's cricket teamThe Pakistan Cricket Board has appointed Hina Munawar as the first female team manager for the Pakistan men's cricket team ahead of the ICC Men's Champions Trophy.

Smith wants Khawaja to open in Ashes after Australia's Sri Lanka winSL vs AUS: Steven Smith backed Usman Khawaja for Australia's Ashes opening spot after his stunning double century against Sri Lanka, praising the veteran batter's resilience and form as Australia fine-tunes preparations for the World Test Championship Final.

5th T20I, Predicted XIs: Will concussion sub Harshit Rana get a look in?India and England are all set to lock horns for the final time in the ongoing T20I series as the action shifts to Mumbai. Will the impressive Harshit Rana get a look in for the 5th T20I after his Pune heroics?

Charlotte Flair returned in grand fashion, while Cody Rhodes and Kevins Owens tore each other apart in an instant classic.

Mohammed Shami, Jaiswal in focus as India aim 'clean-win' in MumbaiIndia and England are set to play their final T20I of the series on Sunday. India will hope finish the series with a win after 'concussion controversy' in the 4th T20I took sheen out of their series win on Friday.

WWE Royal Rumble 2025 Highlights: Jey Uso shocks John Cena, Charlotte winsWWE Royal Rumble 2025 Highlights: Jey Uso has shocked John Cena and eliminated him to win the men's Royal Rumble and head to WrestleMania 41's main event. Earlier in the day, Charlotte Flair marked her return with her second Rumble win.

Jayasuriya slams shot-selection after record loss in GalleSri Lanka head coach Sanath Jayasuriya ripped into the team after their loss in the 1st Test of the 2-match series against Australia. Jayasuriya slammed the batters for playing rash shots.

Bengal Tigers beat Hyderabad Toofans 4-3 to become Hockey India League championsJugraj Singh was the star of the show as the Shrarchi Bengal Tigers were crowned as the Hockey India League champions for the 2024-25 season as they defeated Hyderabad Toofans 4-3 in a thrilling final.

Sachin Tendulkar's speech from BCCI Naman Awards: Full textSachin Tendulkar had the room in awe with his speech at the BCCI Naman Awards on Saturday, February 1. Here's everything he said during his 13-minute interaction with the host Harsha Bhogle.

Virat Kohli gives special gift to Delhi hero Shivam Sharma after Railways winShivam Sharma revealed the special gift he received from Virat Kohli after Delhi's thumping win over Railways in the Ranji Trophy on Saturday, February 1. Shivam was one of the stars for Delhi in the match.

Sachin's advice to Indian cricketers: Don't let distractions disrupt your careerBCCI Awards: Sachin Tendulkar gave a glorious speech after winning the lifetime achievement award on February 1. Sachin finished his speech with advice for the India players - don't let distractions disrupt your careers.

Reverse sweeps, lofted shots: Shubman Gill steps up Champions Trophy trainingShubman Gill has stepped up his training ahead of the Champions Trophy as the Indian batter displayed his full range of shots during a session in Mohali. Gill will be India's vice-captain during the upcoming ICC event.

Sachin finished his speech with advice for the India players - don't let distractions disrupt your careers.

Reverse sweeps, lofted shots: Shubman Gill steps up Champions Trophy trainingShubman Gill has stepped up his training ahead of the Champions Trophy as the Indian batter displayed his full range of shots during a session in Mohali. Gill will be India's vice-captain during the upcoming ICC event.

Kohli-Rohit roles, India vs Pakistan hype: Gautam Gambhir on Champions trophy plansIndia coach Gautam Gambhir has tipped Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma to play massive roles for India during the Champions Trophy. Gambhir also reacted to the hype around the India vs Pakistan game.

Captain Alyssa Healy opts out in body blow for UP Warriorz WPL 2025: The UP Warriorz would not have Alyssa Healy for the upcoming Women's Premier League as she pulled out of the tournament. The Warriorz will be up against Gujarat Giants in their opening game.

Wriddhiman Saha on 2021 India omission: Thought will play 2-3 years moreIn an exclusive chat with Indiatoday.in, Wriddhiman Saha revealed that his omission from the Indian team in 2021 was a call made by the management and believed that he could have played for 2-3 years more. Saha opened up on his favourite memories and captains after announcing his retirement from the game on Saturday, February 1.

U19 Women's T20 World Cup 2025 Final: All you need to knowU19 Women's T20 World Cup 2025: Niki Prasad's India and Kayla Reyneke's South Africa will be up against each other in the summit clash on Super Sunday at the Bayuemas Oval in Kuala Lumpur.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
